com.optimus.mobility.librarysms
Class LibSMSUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.optimus.mobility.librarysms.LibSMSUtils

public class LibSMSUtils
extends java.lang.Object

This library provides various APIs which could be utilized for integrating SMS,CallLogs,Contacts functionality in an Android application.

Method Detail

checkSMSServiceAvailability

public boolean checkSMSServiceAvailability(Context argContext)
To check whether the device has access to SMS enabling services.

Returns:
Boolean indicating the presence of such service.

sendSMS

public void sendSMS(Context argContext,
                    java.lang.String message,
                    java.lang.String recipient,
                    PendingIntent pendingIntent,
                    PendingIntent deliveryIntent)
             throws java.lang.Exception
Send SMS (Make sure to check network using checkSMSServiceAvailability before sending a SMS).

Parameters:
message - Message to be sent (Will be split if more than 160 characters)
recepient - Recipient number
pendingIntent - if not NULL this PendingIntent is broadcast when the message is successfully sent, or failed. The result code will be Activity.RESULT_OK for success, or one of these errors:
RESULT_ERROR_GENERIC_FAILURE
RESULT_ERROR_RADIO_OFF
RESULT_ERROR_NULL_PDU
For RESULT_ERROR_GENERIC_FAILURE the sentIntent may include the extra "errorCode" containing a radio technology specific value, generally only useful for troubleshooting.
The per-application based SMS control checks sentIntent. If sentIntent is NULL the caller will be checked against all unknown applications, which cause smaller number of SMS to be sent in checking period.
deliveryIntent - if not NULL this Delivery Intent is broadcast when the message is successfully delivered. The result code will be Activity.RESULT_OK for success, or one of these errors:
RESULT_ERROR_GENERIC_FAILURE
RESULT_ERROR_RADIO_OFF
RESULT_ERROR_NULL_PDU
For RESULT_ERROR_GENERIC_FAILURE
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

deleteConversation

public boolean deleteConversation(Context argContext,
                                  int conversationId)
                           throws JSONException
Deletes all texts associated with a conversation thread id

Parameters:
argContext - The context of the activity invoking this method.
conversationId - The conversation thread id.
Returns:
Boolean stating if any thread texts were deleted.
Throws:
JSONException

deleteSMS

public boolean deleteSMS(Context argContext,
                         java.lang.String argAddress)
Delete all SMS from a given phone number. Use with Handler to avoid performance issues as querying system resources has latency.

Parameters:
argContext - The context of the activity invoking this method.
argAddress - The Address (Phone Number)
Returns:
If any SMS were deleted.

getListOfConversations

public JSONArray getListOfConversations(Context argContext)
This method uses the activity context to query the Android content provider for the list of conversations(SMS/MMS). Use with Handler to avoid performance issues as querying system resources has latency.

Parameters:
argsContext - Context of the activity calling this function.
Returns:
JSONArray which consists of JSONObjects.The fields represent ConversationThreadId and ConversationPartnerAddress with key values "thread_id" and "address" respectively.The presence of a key-value pair is subject to the availability of the value.

getTextsfromId

public JSONArray getTextsfromId(Context argContext,
                                java.lang.String conversationId)
                         throws JSONException
This method uses the activity context to query the Android content provider for the list of SMS/MMS in a conversation.Use with Handler to avoid performance issues as querying system resources has latency.

Parameters:
argContext - Context of the activity calling this function.
conversationId - Id of the thread containing the conversation texts.
Returns:
JSONArray which consists of JSONObjects.The fields represent MessageTextId,Senders address,TextMessage,Date,Type( MESSAGE_TYPE_ALL = 0, MESSAGE_TYPE_INBOX = 1, MESSAGE_TYPE_SENT = 2, MESSAGE_TYPE_DRAFT = 3, MESSAGE_TYPE_OUTBOX = 4, MESSAGE_TYPE_FAILED = 5,MESSAGE_TYPE_QUEUED = 6) with key values "messageid","address","textmessage","date","type" respectively.The presence of a key-value pair is subject to the availability of the value.
Throws:
JSONException

getTextsfromAddress

public JSONArray getTextsfromAddress(Context argContext,
                                     java.lang.String argAddress)
                              throws JSONException
This method uses the activity context to query the Android content provider for the list of SMS/MMS in a conversation.Use with Handler to avoid performance issues as querying system resources has latency.

Parameters:
argContext - Context of the activity calling this function.
argAddress - Address of the thread containing the conversation texts.
Returns:
JSONArray which consists of JSONObjects.The fields represent MessageTextId,TextMessage,Date,Type( MESSAGE_TYPE_ALL = 0, MESSAGE_TYPE_INBOX = 1, MESSAGE_TYPE_SENT = 2, MESSAGE_TYPE_DRAFT = 3, MESSAGE_TYPE_OUTBOX = 4, MESSAGE_TYPE_FAILED = 5,MESSAGE_TYPE_QUEUED = 6) with key values "messageid","address","textmessage","date","type" respectively.The presence of a key-value pair is subject to the availability of the value.
Throws:
JSONException

deleteSMS

public boolean deleteSMS(Context argContext,
                         int argMessageId)
Delete a particular SMS from its message id. Get message id from the function LibSMSUtils.getTextsfromThreadId OR LibSMSUtils.getTextsfromAddress. Use with Handler to avoid performance issues as querying system resources has latency.

Parameters:
argContext - Context of the activity calling this function.
argMessageId - The id of the message to be deleted.
Returns:
boolean value depicting the success/failure of the operation.

getUnreadMessages

public JSONArray getUnreadMessages(Context argContext)
                            throws JSONException
This method uses the activity context to query the Android content provider for the list of unread SMS/MMS in a conversation.Use with Handler to avoid performance issues as querying system resources has latency.

Parameters:
argContext - Context of the activity calling this function.
Returns:
JSONArray which consists of JSONObjects.The fields represent MessageTextId,Status,Senders Address,TextMessage,Date with key values "messageid","status"(STATUS_NONE = -1;STATUS_COMPLETE = 0;STATUS_PENDING = 32;STATUS_FAILED = 64;),"address","textmessage" and "date" respectively.The presence of a key-value pair is subject to the availability of the value.
Throws:
JSONException

getContacts

public JSONArray getContacts(Context argContext)
                      throws JSONException
Returns a JSONArray with all the contact details by querying Android content providers. Use with Handler to avoid performance issues as querying system resources has latency.

Parameters:
argContext - Context of the activity calling this function.
Returns:
JSONArray which consists of JSONObjects.The fields represent Contact ID,Contact Name, Phone Number, Photo Uri, Contact Email with key values "contactid","displayname","phone","photouri" and "email" respectively.The presence of a key-value pair is subject to the availability of the value.
Throws:
JSONException

getSMSLog

public JSONArray getSMSLog(Context argContext,
                           java.lang.String timeStamp)
                    throws JSONException
Returns SMS log for the duration after the provided TimeStamp value by querying Android content providers. Use with Handler to avoid performance issues as querying system resources has latency.

Parameters:
argContext - Context of the activity calling this function.
timeStamp - The TimeStamp value to begin from for fetching SMS log.
Returns:
JSONArray which consists of JSONObjects.The fields represent SMS Status,Timestamp of the SMS, SMS Text , Senders Address, SMS Id with key values "status"(0=unread,1=read),"date","textmessage","address" ,"messageid" respectively.The presence of a key-value pair is subject to the availability of the value.
Throws:
JSONException

getCallLog

public JSONArray getCallLog(Context argContext,
                            java.lang.String phoneNumber)
                     throws JSONException
Returns call log details by querying Android content providers. Use with Handler to avoid performance issues as querying system resources has latency.

Parameters:
argContext - Context of the activity calling this function.
phoneNumber - PhoneNumber to fetch corresponding call log details. If null, returns complete call log details.
Returns:
JSONArray which consists of JSONObjects.The fields represent

1.Call Type

(1=Received 2=Outgoing 3=Missed),

2.Timestamp of the call


3.Duration


4.Caller phone number


5.Caller phone number type

(1=Home, 2=Mobile,3= Work, 4= Workfax, 5=homefax, 6=pager,7=Other
8=Custom, 9=Callback, 10=Car, 11=Company Main, 12=ISDN, 13=Main, 14=Other Fax, 15= Radio
16=Telex, 17=TTY TDD, 18=WorkMobile, 19=WorkPager, 20=Assistant, 21=MMS)

6.Name of the caller


with key values "calltype","date","duration","phone","numbertype","name" respectively.The presence of a key-value pair is subject to the availability of the value.
Throws:
JSONException
